text: Bishop Diego Salcedo Benacos (May 30, 1575 – April 2, 1644) was a Spanish bishop. He became Roman Catholic bishop of Astorga in 1639, and died in 1644. ==References== ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:1575 births Category:1644 deaths Category:Bishops of Astorga
title: Diego Salcedo (bishop)
